io.micronaut.configuration.kafka

Interface KafkaConsumerAware<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - The key type
    V - The value type

    public interface KafkaConsumerAware<K,V>
    Interface for KafkaListener instances to implement if they wish to obtain a reference to the underlying KafkaConsumer.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setKafkaConsumer(KafkaConsumer<K,V> consumer)
      Called when the underlying KafkaConsumer is created.
